website_summaries.verdict: An attractive curtain rod at an attractive price. Works with most curtains. If you're on a budget, this is one to consider.
pros: Rustic bronze appearance looks more expensive than it is
cons: Not ideal for curtains made of heavy material
the rod is on the thin side, and the finials are small

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! And it was thin enough to work with my command hooks and it looks a lot more highend then what I actually paid for it! So far I haven't seen any sagging despite how big my window is and only using two hooks. Curtians (icy morn):  Command Hooks:
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Cheap! Works as Expected
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and wanted to hang some curtains over draft windows. I decided on this curtain rod due to an Amazon suggestion when I ordered some command strips hooks to hold the rod (I didn't want to deal with screws, nails, and making holes in the walls). This curtain rod works well for the purpose I needed it for and I'm happy that it fits snuggly into the Command hooks! I bought another for other windows in my apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Some-Lady-Who-Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the oil rubbed bronze color and received black curtain rods with a little gold on the finials. Additionally the finials are not round what I received looks nothing like the picture. I needed them ASAP so I kept them but I don’t like them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime S.

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I have a large window in my family room that lets in too much sun certain times of the day. It also affords no privacy from the neighbors. I bought a pair of blackout curtains with grommets and needed a different rod for them to work. Well, this rod did work perfectly. It wasn't too difficult to put up, even though I needed help since I am in a wheelchair. My step-daughter put the rod and curtain up and it looks beautiful and works perfectly. On top of that, it is very attractive, it looks classic. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Jean reader and writer

customer_reviews.title: I think the value is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: These are great rods for the price point if you are looking for something not too expensive and hold something light. I would recommend something more robust for full-length curtains or if they have a curtain that will be frequently manipulated. I used it to put valences on and they work wonderfully for this purpose. I would buy them again without hesitation for a similar purpose. They arrived looking great, have all hardware to install them. I don't think you will be disappointed... in fact, I would be surprised if you purchase them and don't like them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 boys... and a dog :)

customer_reviews.title: Looks good from a distance
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a really sexy looking rod, but it's kind of a cheap plastic thing that pretends to look better than it is. Still, it works well, although the L-brackets that attach to the wall are rather thin. If you're not careful, you'll bend them. They're not really that sturdy. I recommend this curtain rod for thin sheers and lightweight curtains only. Nothing heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Panski

customer_reviews.title: Going to work out well.
customer_reviews.text: One word of note: If your length is close to the max for a specific size, buy one size up. I ordered one for a smaller window and I was very happy with it. The second one I ordered was the same size for a slightly larger window, but the rod is just about as long as it can be and remain intact, and it is a little less sturdy than I would like. Both arrived quickly and are just what I ordered, but if I were to order another I would order the next size up for my second window. I am pleased overall, but this information may be useful for future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: John G ODonnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, classy-looking, affordable
customer_reviews.text: This curtain rod is great. All the pieces came, easy to hang up in the wall. The rod looks classy and high quality, but is such an affordable price. I have medium-weight linen curtains hanging, and I only put in half the screws because I'm in a cheap apartment and couldn't drill into the wall that much, but it's staying up totally fine and looks great over my large living room window! I love that it comes with a middle hook to hold the rod over a larger window. I highly recommend this rod!
customer_reviews.author: A J

customer_reviews.title: It’s a “Meh” From Me
customer_reviews.text: A bit cheesy, but honestly what can you really expect for $20. This will work great as a temporary curtain rod for our bedroom until I can find something better. It just feels a little cheap and too lightweight. It’s also a bit smaller than expected. The paint job is just okay. It looks fine from far away but when examined up close you can start to see all the little imperfections and lower quality features. If you need a quick, low-cost curtain hanging solution then this would be a great option for you. Otherwise, just save your money and give it a hard pass.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Okay. Flimsy looking, difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: I just needed these to hang some blackout curtains for my bedroom, so nothing fancy. They look flimsy, however as I mentioned I was really looking for that so it's not a big deal. The biggest problem is the design of the brackets. They're extremely difficult for me to install because of the portion which hold the rod bends over where the screw goes. I did eventually get them hung up and they are sturdy enough to hold my blackout curtains without any issues. They look okay overall.
customer_reviews.author: LNG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: I just put these up in my new apartment and this is just what i needed. Not much hassle to put together, and because of its simplicity I wasn't worried about damaging the walls too much. Very straightforward and effective, just be careful cuz I don't think the 2 ends solidly connect together in the middle, so they have the potential to slide out of each other. Once they're in place with the curtains though, it's highly unlikely that they would anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Love the curtain rod, same color as the grommets on Flamingo Curtians I purchased through Amazon. The decorative attachment on end is unique, would recommend and buy again myself. The best part I installed myself, no help. I took a vertical down and was able to use same holes that were there, but again very easy.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: They're still good, in fact I'm ordering another curtain rod for ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick, but I wouldn't use the word "sturdy" to describe this curtain rod. I used it to hang up some blackout curtains that probably weigh a few pounds. Let's just say that although they say they will hold 15 pounds, it seems a little bendy in the middle. They're still good, in fact I'm ordering another curtain rod for a different part of my house, and they look good but you know- easy does it with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LovePrime

customer_reviews.title: For the money, get it!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m happy with it! Holds my average weight 8.5ft drapes very well. However, make sure you install the 3rd hanger in the middle above the window as a brace because it is not the best quality and will bend with any weight on it without this piece bracing it up. The look of the rod and tips are quite skinny and a bit too small for the size of my window but can’t complain for the price you pay
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Geringer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Rod/Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for two different windows. They are very easy to install. Just a few screws. In fact, in one location we didn't even have to do anything but place the rod as it just replaced an old outdated brass rod. The other replaced blinds with window panels that look SOOO much better. The install for both windows including the panels took less than 15 minutes and greatly improved the look of our living room and bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: trippinwithtodd

customer_reviews.title: The head doesn't screw on??
customer_reviews.text: I've read some reviews about this product's questionable sturdiness. At first when I assembled it, everything was fine, then one of the heads fell off and won't screw back into place. It's dangling and barely hanging on to its dear life- I can't open and close my curtains without being careful because the rod will fall apart on itself...
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and priced well. INCLUDES 3 MOUNTING BRACKETS!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and looks fantastic. Comes with 3 mounting brackets. 1 for each end and one for the middle to help distribute the weight of curtains. The mounting brackets are 2 1/4" from the wall, have set screws to secure the rod, but are not adjustable. I'm very satisfied with the purchase. I didn't know it came with the mounting brackets so I ordered an adjustable set separately. I'll probably return those since I like idea of 3 mounting points for weight distribution rather than the 2 bracket adjustable set.
customer_reviews.author: A. D. Adair

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This curtain rod is sturdy and great quality! It comes with everything you will need for set up. It has 3 wall mounts to hold the rod (1 in the middle and 1 on either end), 6 screws, and 6 drywall ancors. Once you have the rod adjusted to the length you need and in place there are screws you can tighten on the wall mounts to hold it exactly in place, so no fear of it falling or moving.
customer_reviews.author: Halie

customer_reviews.title: Nice curtain rod for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's more decorative than a plain one you can get at a box store, but at a similar price. Does the trick... used them for Sun Zero curtains I bought from here.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby D

customer_reviews.title: OKay
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I bought it for. It does't look as cheap as it is. But all in all, I bought 2 curtain rods from a competitor, and they cheap as well. Wouldn't use for anything but Grommet drapes cause when opening stirred on drapes they would come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance on 'frequently bought together' and was not disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We bought heavy curtains and this rod was suggested. Not only does it look good, but it went up fairly easily. The installation hardware came with everything including we needed and then some. The only thing I didn't note was the diameter of the pole. It's a little small for its length, but eh, that's not the seller's problem. It's still sturdy enough and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: John, John, the Leprechaun

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Well unfortunately, the screw split the holding bits, making an extra hole in my wall. Other than that they're working fine so far. So the rods themselves are passable. The products that came with it however are not.
customer_reviews.author: Charles reed

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is wrong with the product, but it is not sturdy as the picture suggest, and the rod is quite thin from what i was excpecting, it is for the kids room so iam fine as it gets the work done. over all decent product.
customer_reviews.author: mohdasma

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and does the job
customer_reviews.text: + Looks great for the price + Works with a large variety of curtains + Has a weathered bronze look - Looks very cheap on close inspection, dont expect this to look better than expensive real bronze options.
customer_reviews.author: Dove Family

customer_reviews.title: Standard rod, but looks extra classy!
customer_reviews.text: Standard rod to mountain curtains really. But I do love how pretty it looks! It doesn't feel super sturdy or heavy, it's actually very lightweight. We didn't mount it traditionally as I already have something mounted, but we were actually able to angle the rod and curtains to rest on what I already have in place. So it worked perfectly! I love how it's adjustable as well, it made setting everything up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I honestly thought this would be a really cheap rod, based on the price. I didn't care, because it was for a window that isn't in plain sight and I need something quick and easy to put up. Quick and easy it was, inexpensive it was. It is now holding a relatively heavy insulated curtain on one of my rear windows, and I'm pleased with the look.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ryker (It Is Illegal to Plagiarize)

customer_reviews.title: This product turned out great! I used it over my sliding glass doors ...
customer_reviews.text: This product turned out great! I used it over my sliding glass doors and it is perfect. I even have a few inches of extension left. I hung very heavy, thermal insulated, and black out curtains on it. I did not put up the third bracket yet, but one on each end has held this up very well! It looks great and was super easy to put up. I used just a regular screw driver, not a drill or electric screwdriver.
customer_reviews.author: k.belles

customer_reviews.title: Great aesthetic match to Living room
customer_reviews.text: Good value, good look. I had to bend one of the brackets way up to accommodate my old steam heat pipe. Not ideal but it worked out. I'd recommend using your own dry wall anchors. Otherwise I'm happy with them. Decide where you want your brackets relative to the window first. Measure relative to your ceiling and window frame.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Nice color
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice color and very sturdy. I just think the finials are a little small for the size grommet that I got for my curtains. I won’t replace them, but I think a little larger one would look better.
customer_reviews.author: Kraley

customer_reviews.title: Came bent
customer_reviews.text: I was happy this curtain rod came with all of the hardware, but it was so hard to actually hang the hooks the way they are angled. I think I may have received a used one, the rod was bent too. I carefully bent it back as best as I could to avoid the hassle of shipping a big curtain rod back! It is cute, very skinny, decent overall.
customer_reviews.author: als33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: Has held my heavy black out curtins for 4 months with no issues. Inexpensive. Favorite thing about these are the fact you can adjust the length easily. Slight con, during assembly, the ends felt loose and like they wanted to fall off yet they've been up 4 months with no problems so maybe it was just mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia_D.

customer_reviews.title: Finial broken
customer_reviews.text: The finial end of 1 rod arrived “broken”!!! I originally thought it had untwisted from the end but realized the design was a permanent end and did not untwist...disappointing design
customer_reviews.author: DP Reader

customer_reviews.title: Few quirks but good price.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy installation. There are two design aspects I don't like. 1) This adjusts by allowing a smaller tube to slide into a larger one. The bracket holds the larger tube perfectly, but doesn't attach well to the smaller end. 2) Because of the above problem, I have to be careful when pulling the curtains on that side, as it will pull the small tube out. You then get a hanging curtain rod that you have to climb ontop of something to fix. If you use gromet curtains, you won't have this problem. Great price though for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Brackets included - don't give Amazon free money by purchasing brackets !!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay rod but bows slightly in the center at maximum extension. Be aware that this comes with the brackets and anchor screws ! Don't fall victim to the Amazon "People who bought this item also bought these separate brackets scam" like I did. Wasted a bunch of money on bracket kits but they were cheap enough that it is not worth my while to attempt a return. Free money for Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: HDTVBG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hang and extend
customer_reviews.text: Have held up very well! They're a step up from the flimsy white metal ones, certainly look a little nicer. I wish they came in true black but you hardly notice they aren't when the black curtains are up. Easy to hang and extend, and while they are definitely plastic, it's pretty good solid plastic at that. Who's going to notice way up there anyways? Not me.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: For me came with 3 brackets and plastic anchors and screws. Medium thin rod. Was bit disappointed with the anchors not fitting the bracket with ease (took lot of trouble, including worry of damaging the wall since it will require slightly larger hole than the screw size).
customer_reviews.author: Voski

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: The reviews say a lot about these rods not being sturdy and not holding curtains up. I have the exact opposite experience, and I don't even use the middle hook because I don't like seeing it while the curtains are open. They hold my curtains great and look very nice. I've bought 9 total!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap, decorative option for small/medium windows
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my purposes, nice decorative curtain rod that came with three wall mounts and actual real sized screws! Perfect for my home office window, but considering that there is no mechanism in the rod the lock it in place (one piece just slides out of the other) I would be hesitant to extend it too far. Would not be considered for an extra wide or sliding glass door, but works well for the office window with my new Yoja blackout drapes.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Feather

customer_reviews.title: product as described
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as described. They would hold up most any curtains & easy to install. I ended up returning them only because I found ones in a store that I liked a bit better. I would buy these again though for another room.
customer_reviews.author: tricia coyle

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, and really pretty. It’s holding up the curtain really well without any kind of bends. Highly recommend for a budget curtain rod
customer_reviews.author: Princess_Zelda

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: it is a well made, medium duty curtain rod. Finish is nice. Overall a very good choice. Comes with all installation hardware, just add curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I really like these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these curtain rods for our new home. I really like them. They are easy to install, and easy to take down when I want to clean the curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia M Higgins

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality
customer_reviews.text: ....especially for the price. I know this rod will last. I used decorative command hooks to hang it so I’m speaking of the rod itself, not the hardware.
customer_reviews.author: mir_oca

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as I imagined. I bought it as a replacement for an older curtain rod that my kids broke. This one fit perfectly in the old holes and was super easy to install. I love the look, it matches my rustic bed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: UGH, YES 5 STARS BEING ITS VERY STURDY. I HAVE THE VERY LENGTHY DKNY DRAPES WITH LINER AND THE BIG BRASSY CIRCLE HOLES. MY ONLY PROBLEM IS THAT MY PATIO BLIND BRACKETS STAND OUT FURTHER SO I WILL ORDER THOSE LONGER BUT THE ROD IS GREAT!! PLACE YOUR ORDER!!
customer_reviews.author: HUMBLE BEE

customer_reviews.title: This rod was is nice. It came very quickly
customer_reviews.text: This rod was is nice. It came very quickly, actually like 2 days before expected so that is always nice! It looks great with our white grommet style curtains in my living room! Super easy to install as well, no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie Cuccia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal.
customer_reviews.text: These curtain rods are such a great product for the price. They have beautiful decor on the ends. I bought a whole house full of them and absolutely love them! When our first order was lost, the company got right on it and sent out an additional order to be delivered ASAP. Got them and love them! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Reddig

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Like the color. Wish their was directions. But luckily I’ve installed curtain rods before. And there is nothing you can’t google.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money.
customer_reviews.text: Biggest pile a cheap crap I have ever seen. Its plastic ! Bows in the middle. Not even 1/2 in diameter. Don’t waist your money. As soon as I’m feeling better its getting shipped back.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Looks much more expensive than it is... Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely fabulous.. Very sturdy and looks so expensive I cannot believe that it costs so little. definitely 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn11215

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and all plastic. Sags big time in middle. Needs the middle bracket.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. Comes with the 2 end brackets and one for the middle, all the screws and plastic drywall anchors. Installation went smooth. The ends pop off and the rods slip off for easy curtain mounting. I gave it 3 stars because of it sagging so much. I had a metal bar that did not need the brace in the middle. Now i cannot push both curtains to one side.

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: These curtain rods do not work with curtains that have the rings on them. The wall mounting brackets make it so that you can't slide the curtains open and closed, which forces you to tie them to the side of the windows if you want them open.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes them look more rounded than the ends really are, they're more of a slightly rounded square. But they look good
customer_reviews.author: Ruben F.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this curtain rod! The ends look so stylish and they almost have a vintage asian look to them and the gold and black color is so pretty how they were applied on to the ends too! Sturdy build as well! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: rat

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect these to be amazing since the price is so low, but they are worse than I expected. The paint was chipping off on the finials, and the rod is quite thin. Definitely would not be able to hold up heavy curtains. The color is also black, not bronze, with what looks like gold fingernail polish as accents.
customer_reviews.author: J Mumford

customer_reviews.title: This things feels a little a flimsy when putting it up, but then looks expensive once up
customer_reviews.text: Great rod at a great price. No regrets. Hanged expensive curtains from it, and they look great together. Like an Armani jacket with a Target dress shirt underneath. Work great together. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: John Needham

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice curtain rods, worked great for my dining room. The screws that come with it however are cheap and stripped easily. Used my own screws and the installation went much better..
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Nice finish, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying these without physically seeing them but I do not regret it. Finish is very nice. I'm pleased with the strength. I use them with heavy canvas and they're doing great, but I do use the center support.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very decorative
customer_reviews.text: Nice curtain rods. Not real sturdy but great price. I wouldn't hang heavy curtains on them but they worked great for what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Luvspel57

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all!
customer_reviews.text: I personally think these are junk for the price. I’ve bought WAY sturdier ones for the same price and cheaper even. They’re wobbly and thin. I’d never buy them again. Well see how long they hold up. I installed extra hardware so they don’t sag. Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinplus2

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: This item was fine for the price which is why I'm not sending it back, however buyer beware that the picture of the item as displayed on this website does not come close to actual received. Rubbed bronz as depicted in the picture is a darker brown with goldish trim... the color I received was a dull light off silver and nowhere near a brownish bronz color as shown on the website..... bad advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Verlinde

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my lightweight black out curtains. Great price, great look, would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice product, but not quite oil rubbed bronze.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product, but not quite oil rubbed bronze. It is more of black with some gold painted on. You can't really tell the difference though when it's hanging up.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it’s just not as sturdy or thick as I would like it. Also it doesn’t tighten which could lead to it lengthening or shortening if not bracketed correctly. Does it’s job though
customer_reviews.author: Don Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Love how much character this gave my living room
customer_reviews.text: Love how much character this gave my living room. It looks great and I love how low in price it was! When I was searching around for some new curtain rods, I couldn't pass this one up at the price!! This fit perfectly to go over my bay window and it was super easy to install, the instructions were simple to follow. I really liked that it had a middle support rod, preventing the curtain rod from bending or bowing from too much weight from the curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had a locking system in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Good product. You should check the required circumference for your own brackets before buying any curtain rod. This one is not very thick (5/8") so it should fit most brackets. I used 3M Command Jumbo hooks as I didn't want to drill.
customer_reviews.author: Tonmoy

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look
customer_reviews.text: This was an inexpensive curtain rod and I was surprised with the detail on the ends and how well it holds a fairly heavy curtain. I did not use the brackets that came with it because I was hanging it over vertical blinds (sliding glass door) and I needed extra long ones. If you are hanging something light, they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love this curtain rod. It's looks old and expensive but isn't at all. Super easy to assemble and install. My curtains slide very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Gold accent is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s more good than bronze but I don’t mind it! Very sturdy and size is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Xander T.

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the curtains I put up
customer_reviews.text: I needed two of these for a rental I moved into. They look great and work well with my curtains I think they might be a bit flimsy, but I have not had any problems at all. So I gave them five stars.
customer_reviews.author: M Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Why would u send a person a broken rod this is crazy and im disabled trying to fix my room and this is a set back..
customer_reviews.author: Latasha

customer_reviews.title: good for shorter/ mid length jobs
customer_reviews.text: This does the job for what you pay. I bought it the 48-86'' to use it for my sliding glass door so I have it stretched out pretty far and it sags in the middle. There also is nothing to hold the two sides tight so it doesnt slide - although this has not become a problem yet. But its doing the job and lets me open my curtains with ease.
customer_reviews.author: The Guti's

customer_reviews.title: The material is on the cheap side and the console quality is just bad
customer_reviews.text: The consoles are too short and of low quality. The rod supposed to be bonce but is mainly black and very thin. Well you get what you payed for and my review is 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Studer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curtain rod
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these. They are beautiful and easy to install. Sturdy to a point.
customer_reviews.author: Andres P. Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a great looking and inexpensive curtain rod and this did the trick. Included hardware mounts and it’s doing great holding thick 52” curtains
customer_reviews.author: Saber Roulette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Had it for years and it’s very sturdy, very fashionable and easy to install. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ecto

customer_reviews.title: Used outside !
customer_reviews.text: We used this to hang our 5X9 American Flag .. (because of installing outside for this purpose ... we added 2 more brackets .. Nice looking and durable for indoor/outdoor !
customer_reviews.author: Lavon B. Oneill

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look
customer_reviews.text: Really like this curtain rod as it is great quality, easy to install and look nice. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Measure Measure Measure -
customer_reviews.text: It was easier to work with... my only issue was user error! The window framing got in the way. I failed to recognize that in my measurements
customer_reviews.author: MomMola

customer_reviews.title: ... end of the rods was more square then round like the one shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: All though the end of the rods was more square then round like the one shown in the picture, I still loved them I kinda liked the square shape better but this rod is sturdy and held up my sheer curtains
customer_reviews.author: Ebony T

customer_reviews.title: Great product only reason I took one star off is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product only reason I took one star off is that it comes with the rod holder even though it does not mention so and the fact that the frequently bought items with this are the rod holder makes one believe this does not come with them by default.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curtain rods!
customer_reviews.text: The windows in our new home are very wide. These were a perfect fit. I'm using two panel room darkening curtains in our bedrooms and they hold perfectly and look good. I am very pleased with the rods!

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good price
customer_reviews.text: Installed these in my apartment a while back. Pretty straight forward installation and use. Although it isn’t anything super fancy, I’m very happy with the style and quality to cost ratio
customer_reviews.author: Roberta A.

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty thin and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Decent curtain rod. It is pretty thin and fragile. I'm nervous as to how long it will hold up my blackout curtains. I would definitely recommend this for anyone who is wanting to hang up sheer curtains.

customer_reviews.title: Classy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This curtain rod exceeded my expectations. Economical, yet very sturdy and easy to install. Provides a classy touch to window treatment in my living room and dining room.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our space!

customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this product. It was super easy to install, and is very durable without being bulky, making it great for lightweight or heavier curtains.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rods and Very Quality Looking

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought it twice

After over a year, no bending or bowing like I would expect, very strong and sturdy. I liked it so much I bought another. Unfortunately the window was to big and I couldn't ise
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy, but works
customer_reviews.text: This rod is a tad flimsy for such a long rod. I don't think I would want to use it with medium to heavy curtains, but it works well enough for light curtains when the rod is not fully extended.
customer_reviews.author: M. Benesh

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight rod!
customer_reviews.text: This rod worked for me but it is very lightweight. I had to use the center bracket to keep it from sagging. Wish I would have ordered a heavier rod instead but since this one does work, I kept it. I received it on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: NancyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Nobs on the ends were smaller then I thought and the hangers are a little light but I am happy with it
customer_reviews.author: turtlemark

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install and assemble but not as sturdy as I expected it would be. Hopefully it won’t break on me.
customer_reviews.author: Keyrun Adhikari

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install, from start to finish was about 10 minutes. They are a little thinner than most rods so you will need a center bracket (included) even if your window is only 74" wide. This is due to the weight of the curtains.
customer_reviews.author: George

product_meta.title: Kenney 5/8" Beckett Decorative Window Curtain Rod, 48-86", Oil Rubbed Bronze
product_meta.description:
Color:Oil Rubbed Bronze| Size:48-86"| Design:Curtain RodAdd a touch of style to your home with the Beckett Decorative Window Curtain Rod by Kenney.

The 5/8 inch diameter Beckett curtain rod in oil rubbed bronze finish features matching soft square shaped finial ends. Use in your kitchen, bedroom, dining room, and living room to hang light to medium weight curtains. The telescoping rod adjusts from 48 inches to 86 inches to fit your window and projects 3. 5 inches from the wall. It is ideal for hanging curtains with pockets, grommets, back tabs, and tab tops, but can also be used with clip rings.

Drapery Hardware Set Includes: one telescoping steel curtain rod with decorative plastic finials (1.94" L x 1.45" W x 1.45" H), two mounting brackets, one center support, screws, drywall anchors, and installation instructions.
feature_bullets: The Kenney Beckett 5/8" Standard decorative window curtain rod features soft square shaped finials
5/8" Diameter curtain rod projects 3.5” from the wall and adjusts from 48-86" to fit your window
For use with light to medium weight curtains in your kitchen, bedroom, dining room, and living room
Steel rod in oil rubbed bronze finish with decorative finials and matching mounting hardware
Includes: one telescoping curtain rod with finials, two brackets, one center support, screws, drywall anchors, and installation instructions
